From custom homes to potlight installations and everything in between such as panels and service upgrades, Hotwire Electric-All can meet your electrical needs. We have build our reputation on quality workmanship and impeccable customer service. Coupled with personalized electrical design and advise to suit each individual client. At Hotwire Electric, our certified electricians are 110% committed to serving our clients with great service, honesty, and most important integrity. We offer a full spectrum of services for residential homes and commerical sites, from small projects to large. We strive to be efficient, neat and organized. We ensure our customers’ satisfaction from beginning to end. From basic electrical wiring to high-end lighting design, home automation and million dollar custom homes we insist on paying attention to detail and providing superior workmanship every step of the way. For us, no job is too big or too small Contact us for a quote today and see the Hotwire difference in your project! We offer our residential and commercial services 7 days a week. Contact us for your free estimate on your electrical projects. Hotwire Electric-All in is a fully insured and an authorized electrical contractor with the Electrical Safety Authority. Check out esasafe.com to view our listing. profile:
YOU DREAM IT - WE BUILD IT - 2 WEEKS - WE WILL BEAT ANY COMPETITORS WRITTEN PRICE QUOTATION BY A MINIMUM OF 5% - NO QUESTIONS ASKED - JUST CONTACT US

Finished Basement.ca, (ISM Renobuilders Inc.) is a family-owned and operated business. We specialize in basement renovations providing our customers with a finished basement that is professionally-built with high quality products and materials and finished with old-world craftsmanship, pride and attention to detail. 

Thinking about a Basement Renovation?

Finishedbasement.ca has been providing exceptional basement renovation services in the GTA since 1996. Converting people's dark damp basement's into clean, comfortable and fun living spaces.

We also offer unique, custom designs and consolations in interior decorating provided directly by the founder and owner, who personally oversees and manages all projects. 

Come visit our 3000sq. ft. showroom located in Mississauga. We have just recently added a new addition featuring: Limestone, Marble, Infrared Sauna's, Steam Shower Display and LED Lighting!!!!! 

Also offering in-house Audio Visual solutions by: Pure Custom Integrations. WHo help you understand tomorrows technology TODAY! Specializing in: Home Theatres, Home Automation, Home Integration....and more!

Unable to make it out to our showroom? No problem! Visit our website to explore more photos, video testimonials and our blog.


Thank you from the Finished Basement Crew for taking the time to check us out!

profile:
Quality Home Roofing & Remodeling
City of Toronto licensed, insured and BBB accredited.
 
Quality Home is committed to providing customers with quality service in all roofing projects from complete roof replacement to repair of damaged or missing shingles and expertise in ventilation and insulation. 
 
We have skilled and experienced roofing experts, a high level of services and competitive prices. Using only the best quality roofing materials and meticulous installation practices, we make sure that your roofing work is done right.
 
Our contractors are focused on superior workmanship and are manufacturer certified. We fully stand behind our work and provide you with extended labor and material warranty coverage.
 
We offer each client a customized and unique approach to best fit their needs and assure that the completed work is to their utmost satisfaction.

We at Marvellous Contracting believe that our service, Quality and Craftsmanship is our number one priority in the services we have to offer! 
We are fully licensed and insured. We will not be satisfied until our customers are completely satisfied. 
We are focused on giving quality client care to every one of our customers. 

Our dedication is to work with every customer from the planning stage to the development stage to guarantee your necessities are met in a convenient way. 
All remodels will run into startling difficulties, and we will work with you to guarantee these are set out agreeable to you and, obviously, to code! 
Our responsibility likewise guarantees spotless and respectful staff, and a clean work territory, which is tidied up toward the finish of each workday.

Call us today and find out how we can help you with your upcoming project at an affordable cost!

profile:
We are a Hamilton-based complete renovation company with a proven track record of successful projects and satisfied clients. Our team of skilled contractors will work closely with you, listening to your needs and guiding you through the entire process from conception to completion, turning your vision into reality.
Guided by our core values of Transparency and Trust, we make sure you are always kept fully in the loop and involved in decision making at all key stages of the project. To ensure you are 100% satisfied with our workmanship, all work we carry out is covered by an inclusive guarantee.
With Saveska Construction, you do not have to worry about the stress of dealing with too many trades – but rather pick one contractor who will do it all with quality, speed and attractive rates.
Browse through our website to find out more about us and the work we do and read testimonials from satisfied customers.
We would love the opportunity to meet and discuss your renovation needs and provide you with a free estimate for your next project. Give us a call
We service surrounding areas including Burlington, Oakville, Dundas, Ancaster, Stoney Creek, Binbrook, Milton and Brantford
name: Saveska Construction Inc.
